Hello, 

Some 1911 Obaks for sale. All prices include shipping.

Weaver: $325  (includes priority mail shipping and insurance) SOLD
Reddick: $12 SOLD
Tiedeman: $40 SOLD

Contact me through PM or at [url]pbaldes@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks for looking!
Peter Baldes
